.. raw:: html

   <span class="module-path">libela.hyperelastic.</span>

klosnersegal
==============

Klosner-Segal Model: A four-term model for advanced fitting of hyperelastic materials.

.. math::

   W = c_{11}(I_1-3) + c_{21}(I_2-3) + c_{22}(I_2-3)^2 + c_{23}(I_2-3)^3

.. currentmodule:: libela.hyperelastic.hyperelastic

.. autoclass:: klosnersegal
   :members:
   :show-inheritance:
